Wedding Details

Gray & Mark will be married on the beach of Dreams Riviera Cancun on August 4, 2019 at 6 p.m.

The wedding is followed by a cocktail hour and reception which includes an evening of dinner, drinks and dancing. We look forward to celebrating this special day with our family and close friends.

The resort is family friendly and your children are welcome to attend.
